required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Lando® Absorbable Collagen Membrane in Oral Bone Repair
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study on the Efficacy and Safety of Lando® Absorbable Collagen Membrane in Oral Bone Repair

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, paralleled, control trial to validate the effectiveness and safety of Lando® absorbable collagen membrane for oral bone repair.

primary_outcome.measure: Change value of the width of alveolar ridge
primary_outcome.description: Change value of the width of alveolar ridge by CT

arm_group.description: Subjects randomized in this arm will receive Lando® absorbable collagen membrane after tooth extraction.
Subjects randomized in this arm will receive Bio-Gide resorbable bilayer membrane after tooth extraction.

intervention.description: Subjects who are fit for the study will be randomized to either intervention arms.
Subjects who are fit for the study will be randomized to either intervention arms.
